item.title: An American ‘Iron Dome’ Would Help the U.S. — and Our Allies
item.description: Trump’s team shouldn’t lose sight of the critical role homeland missile defense plays in protecting far-flung regions.

item.title: Emilia Pérez — an Ode to Transgender Globalism
item.description: France’s commercial issue-hustler Jacques Audiard strikes again.

item.title: Pro-Lifers Should Vote No on RFK
item.description: HHS is too important a position for the Senate to confirm a pro-abortion secretary.

item.title: Taiwan and America, &c.
item.description: On tariff wars; a farce in Belarus; an honest congressman; Taylor Swift and the Super Bowl; and more.

item.title: The New Fusionism of Wanting to Blow Stuff Up
item.description: Adherents may be from the right or left, but they share an overriding belief that ‘experts’ and elite institutions have royally messed things up.
